xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.title=Themes for Flamingo ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.currenttheme=Current Theme ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.otherthemes=Other available Themes ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningOldColorThemeInstalled=This is the application to manage the Flamingo Themes. A Flamingo Theme is a customizable variation of any skin based on Flamingo. If you want to manage Color Themes for Colibri-based skins, you should go to {0}Colibri Color Themes Application{1}. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningCurrentOldColorTheme=The current Theme is a Colibri Color Theme which is not optimized to work with a skin based on Flamingo. We have tried our best to make it compatible, but the results might not be optimal. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.useThisTheme=Use this Theme ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.newThemeName=Theme name... ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.create=Create new Theme ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.invalid=Invalid Theme name! ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.csrf=For security reasons, please confirm that you want to create a Theme called "{0}". ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.confirm=Confirm ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.set.success=Theme set to "{0}". ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.title.variables=Variables ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.title.preview=Preview ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.autorefresh=Auto refresh ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.refresh=Refresh ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.refreshwarning=The refresh can take several seconds. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.loading=Loading... ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.logos=Logos ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.base-colors=Base colors ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.typography=Typography ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.forms=Forms ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.buttons=Buttons ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.tables=Tables ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.navbar=Navigation Bar ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.dropdowns=Drop downs ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.panels=Panels ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.breadcrumb=Breadcrumb ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.advanced=Advanced ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.defaultvalue=Default ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.lessCode.description=In this field, you can directly write LESS code which will be added into the skin. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.incompatiblebrowser=Sorry, the preview does not work with this version of Internet Explorer. You need to use a newer browser. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.local=Local ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.global=Global
